scripts.start: del dist\*index.html && del dist\*index.*.js* && set BROWSERSLIST_IGNORE_OLD_DATA=1&& parcel webroot/desktop-index.html
scripts.build: del dist\*index.html && del dist\*index.*.js* && parcel build webroot/index.html && del R:\ItchioBuilds\Prototype\dist\*index.*.js* && robocopy dist R:\ItchioBuilds\Prototype\dist /s /e || powershell -Command "(Get-Content R:\ItchioBuilds\Prototype\dist\index.html) -replace 'src=\"/', 'src=\"./' | Out-File -encoding ASCII R:\ItchioBuilds\Prototype\dist\index.html"
